block.nycto.coffin.no_sleep: You can only sleep during the day
power.nycto.night_vision.desc: Allows you to see in the dark.
power.nycto.bat_form.desc: Transforms you into a Bat, granting flight but reducing maximum health and damage dealt. Costs blood to maintain.
power.nycto.bat_swarm.desc: Summons a swarm of bats that attacks and drinks the blood of anything that you attack or attacks you. Standing in the swarm feeds you the drained blood.
power.nycto.batstep.desc: Instantly teleports you to where you're looking within a short distance, damaging and briefly stunning everything in your path.
power.nycto.blood_barrier.desc: Creates 3 rings of blood that surround you for some time. The rings protect you from harm, but will break when hit with heavy damage.
power.nycto.blood_flechettes.desc: Launches a burst of shards that halt healing on any mob they hit. Attacking a mob affected by this heals you and drains their blood.
power.nycto.bloodrush.desc: Launches you forward wherever you are looking for some time. Extinguishes you if you're on fire.
power.nycto.carnage.desc: Enter a berserk state, dealing increased damage to attacked mobs and causing them to rapidly hemorrhage blood.
power.nycto.dark_form.desc: Transforms you into a hideous beast, granting increased damage and armor, and allows you to jump in the air. Cannot wear armor or use tools, but can break most blocks by hand. Increases in strength the more weaknesses you have. Costs blood to maintain.
power.nycto.haemogenesis.desc: Rapidly regenerates health, removes heal block, and extinguishes you if you're on fire.
power.nycto.hypnotize.desc: Forces all nearby mobs to follow and defend you for some time, or briefly stuns them if they're a player. Hypnotized mobs can have their blood sucked without damaging them. Success is dependent on their current health. Removes hypnosis instead when sneaking.
power.nycto.keen_senses.desc: Muffles sounds and highlights mobs with a color depending on their blood type, including those that are invisible or behind walls. Grants a speed boost while active. Costs blood to maintain.
power.nycto.mist_form.desc: Transforms you into a cloud of mist, becoming invisible, negating fall damage, and phasing through most nonsolid blocks. Attacking a mob always results in a critical hit and reveals you. The first hit of damage you take is negated and reveals you. Costs blood to maintain.
power.nycto.vampiric_thrall.desc: Permanently enthralls a humanoid mob or tamed horse or wolf to become your minion. Thralls retain their abilities from before their undeath. Success is dependent on their current health. Can be told to either follow, stay, or wander by sneak interacting. Can be fed Blood Bottles by sneak interacting.
power.nycto.hydrophobia.desc: Hinders movement in water and rain.
power.nycto.photophobia.desc: You burn much faster in the sun.
power.nycto.pyrophobia.desc: Fire and lava deal more damage.
power.nycto.rich_tastes.desc: You can only drink blood from humanoid mobs. Blood Bottles aren't as filling.
power.nycto.thin_blood.desc: Blood no longer saves you from death.
power.nycto.vile_presence.desc: Neutral mobs become aggressive, animals flee from you and cannot be bred or tamed, and villager trades are more expensive. Hypnotized mobs are unaffected.
advancements.nycto.nycto.root.title: Nycto
advancements.nycto.nycto.obtain_vampiric: Vampiric Daggers drain blood from humanoids
advancements.nycto.nycto.extract_blood_b: Extract a Blood Bottle from a filled Vampiric Dagger by either crafting with or right clicking on with a Glass Bottle
advancements.nycto.nycto.kill_vampire.de: Kill a Vampire on a new moon in forests or taigas
advancements.nycto.nycto.kill_vampire_wi: Kill a Vampire with a Wooden Stake, which bypasses their armor and Blood Veil, and halts their regeneration
Drink a Vampire Blood Bottle to become a vampire
advancements.nycto.nycto.obtain_vampire_: Use a Vampire Altar to choose your first power
advancements.nycto.nycto.complete_vampir: Complete your vampire upgrades and wear a full set of vampire armor
advancements.nycto.nycto.obtain_garlic.d: Find Garlic in forests or swamps
advancements.nycto.nycto.brew_garlic_bre: Add Garlic to an Potion of Healing to make a potion that damages vampires when they hurt you
advancements.nycto.nycto.use_garlic_brew: Apply Garlic Brew to a vampire to weaken them and revert any form changes. If a vampire willingly drinks this, they will lose powers until they become human.
advancements.nycto.nycto.obtain_garlic_w: Garlic Wreaths give nearby vampires negative effects
advancements.nycto.nycto.obtain_garlic_c: Garlic-Coated Halberds bypass Blood Veil and halt regeneration of vampires
advancements.nycto.nycto.wear_vampire_hu: Wear a full set of Vampire Hunter armor
advancements.nycto.nycto.buy_hunter_cont: Purchase a Hunter Contract from a Cleric
death.attack.nycto.bleed.player: %1$s was exsanguinated whilst trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.nycto.toxic_touch.player: %1$s touched something toxic whilst trying to escape %2$s
message.nycto.altar.invalid_transformati: You don't know how to use this
message.nycto.hunter_contract.succeed: A hunter has been contracted and will arrive soon
message.nycto.hunter_contract.fail: It seems there are no hunters nearby
nycto.midnightconfig.title: Nycto (Client)
